ise.pipelines.processing module¶

Pipeline function for processing forcing data, Zenodo output data, and merging them together for use in modelling.

ise.pipelines.processing.process_data(forcing_directory: str, grids_directory: str, ismip6_output_directory: str, export_directory: str) → DataFrame¶

Function for processing forcing data, Zenodo output data, and merging them together for use in modelling.

Parameters:

  • forcing_directory (str) – Directory containing forcing files.

  • grids_directory (str) – Directory containing forcing files.

  • ismip6_output_directory (str) – Directory containing forcing files.

  • export_directory (str) – Directory containing forcing files.

Returns:

master, Master dataset containing all processing outputs.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
